fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When you timewalk, choose day or night. There's an extra phase of the chosen type after this one.
- You may only timewalk twice and you may not timewalk during extra phases.
- If you have the Necronomicon, you can timewalk an infinite number of times and you have a Basic attack during extra nights and your vote counts as three during extra days.
